name: FloodFill
description:
Explore a world of black and white, and reveal new things by inverting the world's colors!

Flood Fill is a short jam game for the Trijam. This game was made in three hours, using the Unity engine, Aseprite, Ecrett music, and Bleeper.

This game was really fun to make, and the limit of three hours really made me plan out things so that I had enough time to finish and polish my game. Overall I like this jam concept, and I'm thinking of participating again :)

Side note: I disabled post-processing on the WebGL build, so if you want a prettier experience, you might want to download the desktop version ;)
